## antha metadata add-tags

Add tags to metadata files for elements

### Synopsis

Add tags to metadata files for elements

```
antha metadata add-tags tag1 tag2 ... [flags]
```

```
      --rootDir string   directory to start finding elements to add tags to (default ".")
```
